'''1.20.2 Pre-release 2''' (known as '''1.20.2-pre2''' in the launcher) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 7, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.20.2 Pre-Release 2|September 7, 2023}}</ref> which reverts changes to recipe book searching, and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Recipe book]]'''
* Reverted the changes of recipe book searching made in the previous pre-release.

=== General ===
'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The resource pack version is now {{cd|18}}.

== Experimental ==
These changes only take effect when the "[[Villager Trade Rebalance]]" experimental data pack is enabled.

=== Changes ===
==== General ====
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Moved the {{cd|d=and|#on_desert_village_maps|#on_jungle_explorer_maps|#on_plains_village_maps|#on_savanna_village_maps|#on_snowy_village_maps|#on_swamp_explorer_maps|#on_taiga_village_maps}} structure tags into the experimental trade rebalance data pack.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.2 Pre-release 2
|;old
|109346|Newly rendered players always look south until they move their head.
|206182|Cannot tab out of console text field of command block.
|235762|Screenshots wider than 16384 pixels causes a crash / {{cd|java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Out of stack space}}.
|249702|Server crash when attempting to start a server with malformatted <samp>banned-ips.json</samp>.
|261119|Accessibility button in the Welcome screen needs its own string.
|262754|Change in {{cd|AbstractScrollWidget}} breaks {{cd|MultiLineEditBox}} click-to-move-cursor behaviour.
|;dev
|264759|Narrator narrates incorrect tab action in command block suggestions.
|;previous
|265237|Recipe book search no longer finds anything containing non-English characters.
|265241|Recipe book search no longer finds relevant items in languages where compound words are not separated.
|265243|Uncraftable variants of a craftable recipe are shown as craftable now.
|265244|Macro arguments entered as floats are converted to scientific notation.
|265245|Crafting book search doesn't find anything when a space is included in the search.
|265253|Fullscreen Resolution value is untranslatable.
|265260|Boats and rafts when placed turn south.
|265262|Revoked recipes remain in the recipe book until relogging.
|265263|Ender Pearl vanishes client side when {{cd|enderPearlsVanishOnDeath}} is false.
|265264|{{cd|trade_rebalance}} tags are not in the {{cd|trade_rebalance}} pack.
|265276|Fire under naturally generated end crystals does not always emit light correctly.
|265280|Mobs sometimes become invisible when you join a singleplayer world.
}}</onlyinclude>
